Dgame.Graphics.VertexArray



class VertexArray: Dgame.Graphics.Drawable.Drawable;
A VertexArray is a user defined OpenGL primitive. It's like Shape, but it is not transformable. It use Vertices and not Pixels. Also it does not use a VBO and is therefore not that performant as a Shape. A VertexArray can use indices and, unlike shape, a texture can be bound.

Author:
rschuett

final this();
CTor

final this(Texture tex);
CTor

final this(Primitive.Type type);
CTor

final this(Texture tex, Primitive.Type type);
CTor

final void setIndices(uint[] indices);
Set new indices. This state the order in which the vertices are drawn. Per default this should be 0, 1, 2, 3, ...

final inout inout(uint)[] fetchIndices();
Fetch the existing indices to mutate them. If no indices are there you can set new indices with 'setIndices' or auto generate them in the natural order with 'generateIndices'.

final uint[] generateIndices(bool complete = true);
Auto generate the indices. If 'complete' is set to false, the existing indices are expanded. Otherwise they are complete generated.

Note:
This must of course be used after adding the vertices.

Returns the indices.

final void bindTexture(Texture tex);
Bind (or unbind) a Texture.

final void setType(Primitive.Type type);
Set a primitive type. The default type is a Quad.

final void append(float[9] vertices, float[6] texels);
Append 9 floats as vertices and 6 as texels to map a texture on a Triangle.

final void append(float[12] vertices, float[8] texels);
Append 12 floats as vertices and 8 as texels to map a texture on a Quad.

final void appendVertex(ref const Vertex vec);
Add a new Vertex.

final void appendVertex(const Vertex vec);
Rvalue version.

final void appendVertices(const Vertex[] vertices);
Add an array of vertices.

final void appendVectors(const Vector2f[] vecs);
Add an array of Vector2f

final void appendArray(const float[] mat);
Add an array of floats Note that 3 dimensional coordinate components are expected.

final void resetVertices();
Reset all Vertices.

final void setColor(ref const Color col);
Set a (new) Color for all vertices.

final void setColor(const Color col);
Rvalue version.
